EmailTemplate.description: Email Template for when Licence record is changed to Active - For LBP Programme
EmailTemplate.name: LBP Active Licence
EmailTemplate.subject: New active licence record - Please update LBP fields on associated Network record
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi LBP Admin team,
There is now a new active Licence record associated to a Network record that has either a Tier 1 or Tier 2 LBP association.
Can you please review the following Licence record and navigate to the associated Network record and update the LBP fields:
Licence Name: {!Account.Name} Facility Name: {!Account.Facility__c}
Kind Regards,
Salesforce Team
